title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
short_cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya Bhaduri, Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Hrithik Roshan, Kareena Kapoor, Rani Mukerji, Farida Jalal, Himani Shivpuri, Alok Nath
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya Bhaduri, Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Hrithik Roshan, Kareena Kapoor, Rani Mukerji, Farida Jalal, Himani Shivpuri, Alok Nath

desc: Years after his father disowns his adopted brother for marrying a woman of lower social standing, a young man goes on a mission to reunite his family.
